metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
List of Kubernetes namespaces to exclude from policy evaluation. Providing a value for this parameter is optional.

metadata.displayName: Rule for a pod to confirm to FSGroup ranges.
metadata.description: The rule for how pods may confirm to the given FSGroup ranges. Either 'MayRunAs', 'MustRunAs, or 'RunAsAny'. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/k8s-psp-fsgroup
Enter valid ranges from 'min' to max' for the FSGroup used in a pod's security context. E.g. { "ranges": [{"min": 1, "max": 1000 }] }
